title: 【1.8】加入新的肉，肉可叠加，以及树
txt_content:
Notch加入了牛肉 羊肉
Notch的原话     Jeb recently tweeted this image, which appears to be pork, beef and lamb in the player inventory. It would seem that Steve is becoming quite the chef! We'll post more information as it becomes available!


看到红色的树没?
Notch 的原话              In this recent tweet, we can see the first released image of a game-generated river! It's a safe bet at the moment that it will face similar height restrictions as default water generation, but that may change in time - after all, we already have legitimately generated waterfalls!

We will keep you posted as more information about rivers is released.
